system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 2nd level, you master the conjuration of tame oozes. You add the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6l4bmc7ovgcn2c9k]{Find Familiar} spell to your spellbook. When you cast the spell, you can choose one of the normal forms for your familiar or choose a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.sbllaxo7dnd5cto4]{Gray Ooze}. When you take the Attack action, you can forgo one of your own attacks to allow your familiar to make one attack of its own.

In addition, oozes you summon move extremely quickly, increasing their Speed to 25 feet.
